description:
Two representatives from Soul Society appear before Rukia.  They are 6th Company Asst. Captain Renji Abarai and Captain Byakuya Kuchiki, Rukia`s older brother.  Swinging his Zanpakuto, Renji demands to know the whereabouts of the human who took Rukia`s Soul Reaper powers.  Rukia is agitated by their presence.  Meanwhile, Kon tells Ichigo that Rukia is missing.
Source: crunchyroll
